functions.function_ast:
FuncDef(
  decl=
    Decl(
      name='main',
      quals=[],
      align=[],
      storage=[],
      funcspec=[],
      type=
        FuncDecl(
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='main',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
    )
  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        Decl(
          name='mon_fichier',
          quals=[],
          align=[],
          storage=[],
          funcspec=[],
          type=
            PtrDecl(
              quals=[],
              type=
                TypeDecl(
                  declname='mon_fichier',
                  quals=[],
                  align=None,
                  type=
                    IdentifierType(
                      names=['FILE'],
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[1]=
        Decl(
          name='donnees',
          quals=[],
          align=[],
          storage=[],
          funcspec=[],
          type=
            ArrayDecl(
              dim_quals=[],
              type=
                ArrayDecl(
                  dim_quals=[],
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='donnees',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['double'],
                        )
                    )
                  dim=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='2',
                    )
                )
              dim=
                Constant(
                  type='int',
                  value='3',
                )
            )
          init=
            InitList(
              exprs[0]=
                InitList(
                  exprs[0]=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='10',
                    )
                  exprs[1]=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='50',
                    )
                )
              exprs[1]=
                InitList(
                  exprs[0]=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='23',
                    )
                  exprs[1]=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='45',
                    )
                )
              exprs[2]=
                InitList(
                  exprs[0]=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='25',
                    )
                  exprs[1]=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='78',
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[2]=
        Assignment(
          op='=',
          lvalue=
            ID(
              name='mon_fichier',
            )
          rvalue=
            FuncCall(
              name=
                ID(
                  name='fopen',
                )
              args=
                ExprList(
                  exprs[0]=
                    Constant(
                      type='string',
                      value='"../data.txt"',
                    )
                  exprs[1]=
                    Constant(
                      type='string',
                      value='"w"',
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[3]=
        If(
          cond=
            BinaryOp(
              op='==',
              left=
                ID(
                  name='mon_fichier',
                )
              right=
                Constant(
                  type='int',
                  value='0',
                )
            )
          iftrue=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='printf',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        Constant(
                          type='string',
                          value='"Impossible de creer le fichier.\\n"',
                        )
                    )
                )
              block_items[1]=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='exit',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='1',
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[4]=
        For(
          init=
            DeclList(
              decls[0]=
                Decl(
                  name='i',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='i',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['int'],
                        )
                    )
                  init=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='0',
                    )
                )
            )
          cond=
            BinaryOp(
              op='<',
              left=
                ID(
                  name='i',
                )
              right=
                Constant(
                  type='int',
                  value='3',
                )
            )
          next=
            UnaryOp(
              op='p++',
              expr=
                ID(
                  name='i',
                )
            )
          stmt=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='fprintf',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        ID(
                          name='mon_fichier',
                        )
                      exprs[1]=
                        Constant(
                          type='string',
                          value='"Ligne%i: %.2lf %.2lf\\n"',
                        )
                      exprs[2]=
                        BinaryOp(
                          op='+',
                          left=
                            ID(
                              name='i',
                            )
                          right=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='1',
                            )
                        )
                      exprs[3]=
                        ArrayRef(
                          name=
                            ArrayRef(
                              name=
                                ID(
                                  name='donnees',
                                )
                              subscript=
                                ID(
                                  name='i',
                                )
                            )
                          subscript=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='0',
                            )
                        )
                      exprs[4]=
                        ArrayRef(
                          name=
                            ArrayRef(
                              name=
                                ID(
                                  name='donnees',
                                )
                              subscript=
                                ID(
                                  name='i',
                                )
                            )
                          subscript=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='1',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[5]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='fclose',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                ID(
                  name='mon_fichier',
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[6]=
        Return(
          expr=
            Constant(
              type='int',
              value='0',
            )
        )
    )
)
